PackageOracle.name: DA_CONTENT_ORDER
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CONTENT_ORDER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.47.730448000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_amt IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_amt IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_amt IN NUMBER
,content_order_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_order_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_content_order;

body.name: DA_CONTENT_ORDER
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CONTENT_ORDER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.47.743619000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_amt IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_order.add(fx), parms=' || account_id || '|' || billing_dttm || '|' || billing_amt || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || equip_mac_address_id || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || title_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_content_order a
(
a.account_id
,a.billing_dttm
,a.billing_amt
,a.content_order_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.equip_mac_address_id
,a.source_system_id
,a.title_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_id
,add.billing_dttm
,add.billing_amt
,chtr.s_content_order_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.equip_mac_address_id
,add.source_system_id
,add.title_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.content_order_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_order.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_amt IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_order.add, parms=' || account_id || '|' || billing_dttm || '|' || billing_amt || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || equip_mac_address_id || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || title_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_content_order a
(
a.account_id
,a.billing_dttm
,a.billing_amt
,a.content_order_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.equip_mac_address_id
,a.source_system_id
,a.title_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_id
,add.billing_dttm
,add.billing_amt
,chtr.s_content_order_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.equip_mac_address_id
,add.source_system_id
,add.title_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_order.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,billing_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,billing_amt IN NUMBER
,content_order_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,title_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_order.add, parms=' || account_id || '|' || billing_dttm || '|' || billing_amt || '|' || content_order_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || equip_mac_address_id || '|' || source_system_id || '|' || title_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_content_order a
(
a.account_id
,a.billing_dttm
,a.billing_amt
,a.content_order_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.equip_mac_address_id
,a.source_system_id
,a.title_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.account_id
,add.billing_dttm
,add.billing_amt
,add.content_order_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.equip_mac_address_id
,add.source_system_id
,add.title_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_order.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,content_order_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_content_order.del, parms=' || content_order_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_content_order a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.content_order_id = del.content_order_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_content_order.del');

END del;

END da_content_order;
